price: 63.Wonna hinnay koros sorkocobaxitte iggimaay agay-waagat tan A-Qhuraanal yaamineenimik, kaadu usun wohuk kalah maggo urna taamoomi- lon, usun tet taamite-lon Yallak naqabuu kee digaalá geyaanamkch.
arabic: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal qulūbuhum fī ghamratin min hādhā walahum aʿmālun min dūni dhālika hum lahā ʿāmilūna
